[CDF-24555] ðŸ“‚ Support dump files (#1594)

# Description

Adds support for dumping file metadata to csv/parquet.


![image](https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/792487db-988d-414e-878d-0edde9911490)


## Changelog

- [x] Patch
- [ ] Minor
- [ ] Skip

## cdf

### Added

- [alpha] Support for dumping files medata, `cdf dump data
filesmetadata`. To enable this set the flag `dump_data = true`.

## templates

No changes.
